summary: This mod adds Potion Sickness after drinking a Health potion. While the effect is active, drinking another potion will do nothing (no heal).
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00]This mod adds Potion Sickness after drinking a Health potion. While the effect is active, drinking another potion will do nothing (no heal).[/color]

Potions are also buffed up to (hopefully) balance things out. Potion names are also more "Terraria" style.

Do not drink another potion while the Potion Sickness is still active, otherwise the potion will be wasted. Don't know how to grey out potions when the effect is active, so sorry about that. (Any help is appreciated)
Planning on making a quest that makes the potions quest items if it detects the Potion Sickness effect.

[u][color=#ff0000][size=3]Version 2
[/size][/color][/u][color=#ffff00]Added Band of Regeneration, Philosopher's Stone and Charm of Myths. All these items are originally from Terraria. Idea by ArynAshkin.[/color]

[color=#ff7700]Band of Regeneration:[/color]
Health regenerates 25% faster.
Can be found in the Whiterun Temple of Kynareth.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/qsajk6g.png[/img]

[color=#ff7700]Philosopher's Stone:[/color]
Reduces Potion Sickness Effect duration from 30 to 15 seconds.
Can be found in the College of Winterhold Arcanaeum. Master lock chest.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/CNcW7Yz.png[/img]

[color=#ff7700]Charm of Myths:[/color]
Health regenerates 25% faster and Reduces Potion Sickness Effect duration from 30 to 15 seconds.
Can be crafted at a smithing forge by combining the Band of Regeneration and Philosopher's Stone together.



[color=#6d9eeb]Changes:

Potion of Minor Healing (Heals 25) ---> Lesser Healing Potion (Heals 50)

Potion of Healing (Heals 50) ---> Healing Potion (Heals 100)

Potion of Plentiful Healing (Heals 75) ---> Greater Healing Potion (Heals 150)

Potion of Vigorous Healing (Heals 100) ---> Super Healing Potion (Heals 200)

Potion of Extreme Healing (Heals 150) ---> Hyper Healing Potion (Heals 300)

Potion of Ultimate Healing (Heals 9999) ---> Ultimate Healing Potion (Heals 19998)[/color]



Please tell me if this is too underpowered or overpowered, and a way to balance it out.



There is a problem with Player brewed health potions. (The potions that the player can craft themselves at an alchemy table with ingredients)
[img]https://i.imgur.com/DvR4ka5.png[/img]﻿
I can't find the custom made health potions' data in the Creation Kit, so these potions will not give you Potion Sickness. Apologies for that.
